annotations.description: Finally a cocktail from my Hometown of Boston Massachusetts! This delightful little number was created by Nicole Lebedevitch at The Hawthorne in Boston, MA a...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Ce Soir

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Cognac
.75oz (22.5ml) Cynar
.5oz (15ml) Yellow Chartreuse
1 Dash Angostura Bitters
1 Dash Regan's Orange Bitters
Lemon Twist and Discard

Stir and pour. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pV1KfiNK6Mg
title: Ce Soir
